text: Martin "Marty" Wright (born July 15, 1964), better known by his ring name The Boogeyman, is an American professional wrestler. and fitness instructor. He is currently signed to WWE under a legends contract, and is best known for wrestling there from 2005–2009. == Championships and accomplishments == * Alabama Wrestling Federation ** AWF Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Bobby Lashley * Pro Wrestling Illustrated ** Rookie of the Year (2006) ** Ranked No. 114 of the top 500 singles wrestlers in the PWI 500 in 2007 ==References== == Other websites == * *Online World of Wrestling profile Category:1964 births Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Arizona Category:WWE people
title: The Boogeyman (wrestler)
